document_data.name: The Winking Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''The Winking Eye''' was a popular tavern that stood on the grand [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] in the city of [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Location: The tavern stood on the northwestern corner of the crossing of the Promenade and the looping [[Court Close]]. The establishment was located on the second block to the west from [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.History: The Winking Eye was opened sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1356}}.
